io.spine.core

Class CommandEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.core.AbstractMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>
      • io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>, MessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>

    public final class CommandEnvelope
extends AbstractMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>
implements ActorMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>
    The holder of a Command, which provides convenient access to its properties.

      • setOriginFields

        public void setOriginFields(io.spine.core.EventContext.Builder builder)
        Sets the origin fields of the event context being built using the data of the enclosed command.

        In particular:

        • the command identifier is set as the root command identifier;
        • the context of the enclosed command is set as the origin.
        Specified by:
        setOriginFields in interface MessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.CommandId,io.spine.core.Command,io.spine.core.CommandContext>
        Parameters:
        builder - event context builder into which the origin related fields are set
